lines.text: His Shadow!
His Divine Shadow. Yes.
The Brunnen-G will defeat you!
I did not think so. The power of order has destroyed your planet. The power of order will destroy you. And you are the last of the Brunnen-G left alive.
The Time Prophet has seen your order destroyed by the Brunnen-G.
The Time Prophet's vision appears to be flawed.
[Stabs Kai in the chest with a dagger]
[an officer steps forward as His Shadow looks to him]
We will incinerate the carcass.
No. This last specimen of the now extinct culture of romantic dreamers merits punishment beyond death. Transport him to the bio-scholars.
What kind of robot are you?
I'm a robot who wants to live in your underpants.
In the light universe, I have been darkness. Perhaps in the dark zone I will be light.
Would you care to join me in watching the supernova? It is a once-in-a-lifetime experience.
My life means nothing in the great equation. Beauty such as yours must live on.
Are there other heretics with you?
Lots. They are coming up here now and they are heavily armed.
No. You are alone.

[falls to his knees]
We worship his divine Shadow and beg his forgiveness.
Don't Stan. Die with some dignity.

[Gets up]
I the, arch heretic, am reformer Stanley Tweedle. And though only an assistant deputy and back up courier, I did everything I could, I really tried!
I have killed mothers with their babies. I have killed great philosophers; proud young warriors and revolutionaries. I have killed the evil, the good, the intelligent, the weak... and the beautiful.
Malfunction
[falls off pipe, spins on rotary thing, bounces off wall]
Ow!
[part falls off]
Bug-bomb lost head!

Remember Erika? The only reason millions, MILLIONS died for that overheated rock was because two Erikans were bio-code specialists for the Cluster. We fought that war, traitor, so I could be here today.
[raises hand]
They died, so I could have the key to the Lexx.
Hail Thodin! Winner of His Shadow's award of merit!
[Thodin goes up to them and steals their guns, lifting the arm on one robot and the other robot lifts its own arm]
Good Boys.
Hail Thodin! Winner of
[pause]
correction, award of merit rescinded! Thodin, Arch-Heretic and rebel, you are wanted for immediate termination!
[lift arms, pause]
Please return our weapons!
[Thodin shoots and vaporizes the robots]
May his Shadow fall upon you.
